description:
In the Flower Capital, the Fire Festival is about to end. On Onigashima, the battle between Luffy and Kaido is getting even more intense. However, Kaido who is excited about having a strong opponent starts drinking too much.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drunken Dragon Bagua! The Lawless Dragon Closing in on Luffy
L`ivresse du dragon divin. Luffy contre un adversaire intenable !
Schnapsdrache der acht Trigramme! – Der brutale Drache nimmt Ruffy aufs Korn
Shuron Hakke! Luffy ni Semaru Muhou no Ryuu
酒龍八卦! ルフィに迫る無法の龍
